action.action-desc: Ms. Porter (for herself, Mr. Lowenthal, and Ms. Lee of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to remove a limitation on amounts provided under the clean school bus program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the California Clean School Bus Equity Act.
Section 741(b)(7) of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 16091(b)(7)) is amended to read as follows:

subparagraph.text: to the maximum extent practicable, achieve nationwide deployment of clean school buses and zero-emission school buses through the program under this section; and
ensure a broad geographic distribution of awards.
